ns0:DescribedValueSet.ns0:Purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent amitriptyline / perphenazine combination medications.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) datatype related to Medication, Ordered.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with semantic clinical drugs; generic; human use only; prescribable; amitriptyline / perphenazine (combination medication).),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes branded drugs; components or ingredient only; non-prescribable; amitriptyline / perphenazine in combination with other medications.)
